title: Customary Charge
text: Compute Customary Charge Conversion Factor physician following charge history: procedure, divide customary charge relative value, multiply result procedure‚Äôs frequency: Divide sum calculation sum frequency:
code: charges <- data.frame(   procedure = 1:5,   charge = c(5, 12, 35, 20, 8),   value = c(1, 2, 4, 3, 1.5),   frequency = c(3, 7, 5, 4, 6) )  charges #>   procedure charge value frequency #> 1         1      5   1.0         3 #> 2         2     12   2.0         7 #> 3         3     35   4.0         5 #> 4         4     20   3.0         4 #> 5         5      8   1.5         6 charges <- collapse::mtt(charges, calculation = (charge / value) * frequency) charges #>   procedure charge value frequency calculation #> 1         1      5   1.0         3    15.00000 #> 2         2     12   2.0         7    42.00000 #> 3         3     35   4.0         5    43.75000 #> 4         4     20   3.0         4    26.66667 #> 5         5      8   1.5         6    32.00000 sum(charges$calculation) / sum(charges$frequency) #> [1] 6.376667

title: Customary Charge
text: prevailing charge conversion factors used appropriate relative value scale developed formula used customary charge conversion factors, except : CHG: fully adjusted locality prevailing charge procedure locality specialty group specialties (regardless source data locality prevailing charge developed). SVC: number times procedure performed physicians specialty group specialties locality. 1-n: different procedures within category service prevailing charges established specialty group specialties locality. conversion factors calculated fee screen year reflect customary prevailing charges calculated basis charge data year ending June 30 immediately preceding start fee screen year. Also, reasonable charge screens established use relative value scale conversion factors consist two components. Consequently, conversion factors must recalculated change relative value units assigned procedures (may occur use different updated relative value scale) order assure change(s) unit values violate integrity reasonable charge screens. economic index limitation, rollback provision, Administrative Savings Clause applied directly prevailing charge conversion factors calculated accordance section.

text: Andrew Bruce. Author, maintainer, copyright holder.

Conversion Factor ‚Äî conv_fct
text: data frame 36 rows 6 columns: date_start Effective Date date_end End Date date_iv Date Interval cf Conversion Factor chg_abs Absolute Change chg_rel Relative Change

title: Conversion Factor ‚Äî conversion_factor
text: dos <Date> Date Service, form YYYY-MM-DD; default NULL

title: Conversion Factor ‚Äî conversion_factor
text: tibble containing conversion factors; dos provided, returns conversion factor date

title: arkrvu 0.0.1.9001
text: update standalone-helpers updated rvu_link_table code reformatting changed pkgname rbrvs arkrvu (2024-12-03) get_pprrvu_() using future/furrr get_conversion_factor() refactored data: processed 2024 PPRVU files

title: arkrvu 0.0.0.9001
text: Added article, guide RVU file format.

title: arkrvu 0.0.0.9000
text: Initial commit. Added NEWS.md file track changes package. Pinned test RVU file dataset.
